org.metaborg.spoofax.shell.client

Interface IEditor


  • public interface IEditor
    An IEditor is where expressions in some language can be typed. It takes care of the prompt, keybindings, the history and multiline editing capabilities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getInput()
      Get the input from the user, optionally spanning multiple lines.
      IInputHistory history() 
      void setContinuationPrompt(StyledText styledText)
      Set the prompt to display when in multi-line mode.

      Set the prompt to display.

      Set the completion service to be used when hitting TAB.

    • Method Detail

      • getInput

        String getInput()
         throws IOException
        Get the input from the user, optionally spanning multiple lines.
        Returns:
        The input typed in by the user.
        Throws:
        IOException - when an IO error occurs.

      • setSpoofaxCompletion

        void setSpoofaxCompletion(org.metaborg.core.completion.ICompletionService<org.metaborg.spoofax.core.unit.ISpoofaxParseUnit> completionService)
        Set the completion service to be used when hitting TAB.
        Parameters:
        completionService - The ICompletionService for providing completion.

      • history

        IInputHistory history()
        Returns:
        The history of evaluated expressions, oldest entries first.

      • setPrompt

        void setPrompt(StyledText promptString)
        Set the prompt to display.
        Parameters:
        promptString - The prompt string.

      • setContinuationPrompt

        void setContinuationPrompt(StyledText styledText)
        Set the prompt to display when in multi-line mode.
        Parameters:
        styledText - The prompt string.
